recipies.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipies.instructions: Heat oil in a pan. Add chopped garlic and onion. Sauté for 2 minutes. Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes. Add soy sauce, stir well, and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot with rice or noodles.

recipies.name: Chickpea Salad
recipies.instructions: Rinse chickpeas and place in a bowl. Chop cucumber and tomato, then add to the bowl. Mix in olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Toss well and serve fresh.

recipies.name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
recipies.instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente. In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté sliced garlic until golden. Add chili flakes. Mix in drained spaghetti and toss well. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

recipies.name: Lentil Soup
recipies.instructions: Sauté chopped onion, garlic, carrot, and celery in a pot. Add lentils, broth, and cumin. Simmer for 25–30 minutes until lentils are soft. Blend for a smooth texture if desired. Serve hot.
